text: Shelburne is a town in Chittenden County, Vermont, United States. It is located along the shores of Lake Champlain. Shelburne is a suburb of Burlington. Shelburne's town center is about south of Burlington's city's center. The population of Shelburne was 7,717 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Towns in Vermont
title: Shelburne, Vermont
